The movie and TV collection you always wished for. Granted.

spoTunes is a streaming service that offers a wide variety of award-winning TV shows, movies, anime, documentaries, and more on thousands of internet-connected devices. You can watch as much as you want, whenever you want without a single commercial â€“ all for one low monthly price. There's always something new to discover and new TV shows and movies are added every week!

Watch Everywhere.

Watch anywhere, anytime, on an unlimited number of devices. Sign in with your spoTunes account to watch instantly on the web at spoTunes.com from your personal computer or on any internet-connected device that offers the spoTunes app, including smart TVs, smartphones, tablets, streaming media players and game consoles. You can also download your favorite shows with the iOS, Android, or Windows 10 app. Use downloads to watch while you're on the go and without an internet connection. Take spoTunes with you anywhere.
